name: Purple Dip Dyed Denim Shorts
description:
Light blue denim shorts with the bottom half dip dyed a lilac/pale purple colour. 

PLEASE NOTE: Photos were taken using my iPad, and I promise the shorts look better in real life!

Please note: due to the dyes used and the fabric of the shorts, they may fade after being washed, so I would recommend to wash them on as cold a wash as possible, or hand wash if you can 

For more information contact:
@whatweare_ on twitter
sara0hobbs@gmail.com

name: Aztec Pocket Denim Shorts
description:
Medium blue denim shorts with blue and white Aztec print fabric lining the front pockets, and covering one of the back pockets.

PLEASE NOTE: Photos were taken using my iPad, so aren't great, I promise the shorts look better in real life!
